titleStmt.title: Montrose redivivus, or The portraicture of James late Marquess of Montrose, Earl of Kincardin, &c. 1. In his actions, in the years 1644. 1645. and 1646. for Charles the First. 2. In his passions, in the years 1649. 1650. for Charles the Second K. of Scots.
titleStmt.author: Wishart, George, 1599-1671.

titleStmt.title: Montrose redivivus, or The portraicture of James late Marquess of Montrose, Earl of Kincardin, &c. 1. In his actions, in the years 1644. 1645. and 1646. for Charles the First. 2. In his passions, in the years 1649. 1650. for Charles the Second K. of Scots.
titleStmt.author: Wishart, George, 1599-1671.
Pontius, Paulus, 1603-1658, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jo. Ridley, at the Castle in Fleet-street, neer Ram-alley,

notesStmt.note: A translation, with additions, of: Wishart, George. De rebus auspiciis serenissimi, & potentissimi Caroli.
The words "in the years 1644. 1645. 1646." and "in the years 1649. 1650." are enclosed in brackets on title page.
Portrait engraved and signed: P. Pontius sculpsit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
